name: PeopleStrong
description: Our comprehensive HR Tech 4.0 platform encompasses employee lifecycle from hire to exit, including Human Capital Management, Payroll, Talent Acquisition & Management, and Collaboration.  Simplifying work life for over 2 Million employees at 500+ large enterprises across AsiaPac.Our technology is a reflection of the growing needs of modern, talent-focused enterprises and their increasingly complex HR use cases; of people and business leaders who want technology to do more. We are on a mission to power the Talent Economy with HR Tech 4.0.
business_objectives: Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline:
Customers' Choice for
 Talent-Focused enterprises
 across APAC
ShortDescription: People strong power the momentum of modern talent-focused enterprises

Highlights.name: Talent Acquisition
Highlights.description: AI-powered, intelligent, and scalable recruitment platform that helps you become a talent magnet.

Highlights.name: Payroll and Workforce Management
Highlights.description: Reliable, secure, and transparent payroll and workforce management technology for seamless, hassle-free operations.

Highlights.name: Human Capital Management
Highlights.description: An all-inclusive HR tech suite for leveraging data, processes, and insights to enhance employee experiences seamlessly.

enhanced_description: PeopleStrong offers a comprehensive HR Tech 4.0 platform designed for modern, talent-focused large enterprises across AsiaPac. It covers the entire employee lifecycle from hire to exit, including Human Capital Management, Payroll, Talent Acquisition & Management, and Collaboration. The platform is built on a scalable and agile architecture with enterprise-grade security, featuring AI and ML-led innovations, particularly in its AI-powered talent acquisition module. It aims to simplify work-life for over 2 million employees at 500+ large enterprises by providing an all-inclusive HR tech suite that leverages data, processes, and insights to enhance employee experiences and support complex HR use cases.
key_use_cases: Managing the entire employee lifecycle from hire to exit
Streamlining and automating talent acquisition processes
Enhancing overall employee experience through HR technology
Leveraging data and insights for HR decision-making
competitive_advantages: Comprehensive HR Tech 4.0 platform covering the entire employee lifecycle
Scalable and agile architecture for growing enterprise needs
AI and ML-led innovations, particularly in talent acquisition
Proven track record with over 2 Million employees and 500+ large enterprises in AsiaPac
Focus on enhancing employee experiences through data-driven insights
Reliable and transparent payroll and workforce management capabilities
roi_benefits: Faster and more efficient hiring of top talent
Simplified work-life for employees and HR
Improved operational efficiency in HR and payroll
Ability to attract and retain talent effectively
Better data-driven decision making in HR
scalability_features: Designed to support over 2 million employees at large enterprises
security_features: Secure payroll and workforce management technology
